title: Prague hotels  - booking - Prague, Czech Republic  - HotelsArea.com
content: Book Prague hotels with HotelsArea. To instantly check availability for all Prague hotels and make an online booking, use the search form. You can also access the booking form for each property by clicking on its 'book now' button.
